newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnish Feb core inflation unchanged yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Finnish Feb core inflation unchanged yr/yr.

text.p: Finnish core inflation in February was unchanged year-on-year and rose 0.2 percent month-on-month, Statistics Finland said in a statement on Tuesday.
The February index figure was 111.3. The base year (100) is 1990.
The mean of four economists' forecasts for the February core inflation rate had been for a 0.2 percent rise in a +/-0 percent to +0.3 percent range.
The Bank of Finland's target for the year-on-year change in the underlying rate of inflation -- its chief gauge for monetary policy -- is a rise of no more than around two percent.
